net.sourceforge.jaad.mp4.api

Class Track

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.jaad.mp4.api.Track
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AudioTrack, VideoTrack

    public abstract class Track
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a track in a movie. Each track contains either a decoder specific info as a byte array or a DecoderInfo object that contains necessary information for the decoder.

        public abstract Type getType()

      • getCodec

        public abstract Track.Codec getCodec()

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if the track is enabled. A disabled track is treated as if it were not present.
        Returns:
        true if the track is enabled

      • isUsed

        public boolean isUsed()
        Returns true if the track is used in the presentation.
        Returns:
        true if the track is used

      • isUsedForPreview

        public boolean isUsedForPreview()
        Returns true if the track is used in previews.
        Returns:
        true if the track is used in previews

      • getCreationTime

        public java.util.Date getCreationTime()
        Returns the time this track was created.
        Returns:
        the creation time

      • getModificationTime

        public java.util.Date getModificationTime()
        Returns the last time this track was modified.
        Returns:
        the modification time

      • getLanguage

        public java.util.Locale getLanguage()
        Returns the language for this media.
        Returns:
        the language

      • isInFile

        public boolean isInFile()
        Returns true if the data for this track is present in this file (stream). If not, getLocation() returns the URL where the data can be found.
        Returns:
        true if the data is in this file (stream), false otherwise

      • getLocation

        public java.net.URL getLocation()
        If the data for this track is not present in this file (if isInFile returns false), this method returns the data's location. Else null is returned.
        Returns:
        the data's location or null if the data is in this file

      • getDecoderSpecificInfo

        public byte[] getDecoderSpecificInfo()
        Returns the decoder specific info, if present. It contains configuration data for the decoder. If the decoder specific info is not present, the track contains a DecoderInfo.
        Returns:
        the decoder specific info
        See Also:
        getDecoderInfo()

      • getDecoderInfo

        public DecoderInfo getDecoderInfo()
        Returns the DecoderInfo, if present. It contains configuration information for the decoder. If the structure is not present, the track contains a decoder specific info.
        Returns:
        the codec specific structure
        See Also:
        getDecoderSpecificInfo()

      • getProtection

        public Protection getProtection()
        Returns the ProtectionInformation object that contains details about the DRM system used. If no protection is present this method returns null.
        Returns:
        a ProtectionInformation object or null if no protection is used

      • hasMoreFrames

        public boolean hasMoreFrames()
        Indicates if there are more frames to be read in this track.
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one more frame to read.

      • readNextFrame

        public Frame readNextFrame()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the next frame from this track. If it contains no more frames to read, null is returned.
        Returns:
        the next frame or null if there are no more frames to read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading fails

      • seek

        public double seek(double timestamp)
        This method tries to seek to the frame that is nearest to the given timestamp. It returns the timestamp of the frame it seeked to or -1 if none was found.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - a timestamp to seek to
        Returns:
        the frame's timestamp that the method seeked to
